amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 519, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-28 is considered as adopted.
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 519, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-28 is considered as adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
